Sentence: According to the elder people, a disastrous flood like this has never emerged in the history of the city.
The Representatives of Charitable Fathers and Merciful Mothers Visited the Affected Community
The Ilqi Company delivered love to the people in the disaster area of Hotan
All leaders from province, county, and village visited the local disaster area.
May 21, 2015, the flood lost; its control slowly decreased.
On May 21, 2015, the flood, which was out of control, started to abateslowly through the afternoon.
May Allah bless you. Feedback reported.

May Allah prevent disasters like this.
